value.title: StarCraft 2: INCREDIBLE SKILL! (Maru vs Scarlett)
value.excerpt: The skill level of StarCraft 2 is still constantly going up, and that's very clear in this amazing match of Terran versus Zerg. value.title: StarCraft 2: Neeb Plays SKYTOSS Without CARRIERS?! (Scarlett vs Neeb)
value.excerpt: SkyToss is very common at the professional level of StarCraft 2. However it usually is played with as many Carriers as possible. In this game of Zerg versus Protoss between Scarlett and Neeb, the Protoss player decides to skip Carriers entirely.  Support my work on Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/lowkotv

value.title: StarCraft 2: ULTRALISKS VERSUS PROTOSS? (soO vs Zest)
value.excerpt: Ultralisks are uncommon in StarCraft 2 currently. Especially in the Zerg versus Protoss matchup we barely ever see Ultras simply because Protoss has many different counters available to deal with them. value.title: StarCraft 2: ULTRAS vs MECH?! (soO vs Clem)
value.excerpt: Ultralisks are a bit of an odd unit right now. They are very good in very specific situations, but really are rather bad overall compared to other late-game units. value.title: StarCraft 2: WHO CALLED IN THE FLEET? (Dark vs TY)
value.excerpt: Dark versus TY in an epic game of StarCraft 2. In this game of top-level StarCraft we see TY play a different approach than most Terrans do at this level. A lot of Terran players enjoy playing a late-game composition based around the Thor at the moment, but TY decides to focus on a Battlecruiser army
